name: Ball: Smash It
description:
SMASH EVERYTHING
OVER 100+ LEVELS
DOWNLOAD NOW!

Ball Smash It is a hyper casual game with bricks breaking theme. Easy to play, no network required.

Smash the ball to break the blocks on the way down. Aim for the center of the bricks for PERFECT score. Challenge yourself with hundreds of levels!

FEATURES
- Amazing Ball
- Trickster blocks
- 100+ levels
- Easy to play
- Challenging difficulty
- Relaxing themes
- Special effects for combos

HOW TO PLAY
- Aim for the center of the moving blocks
- Ball Smash it!
- Avoid hitting the wrong place
- Avoid the red parts
